text: Va [ej pajomʙar] tu masƣuli hec kore nesti va hec [ojate az] onro namexoni va [sumo niz ej mardum] hec kore namekuned, magar inki on goh ki ʙa on mepardozed, Mo ʙar [korhoi] sumo guvohem va hamvazni zarrae – [na] dar zamin va na dar osmon – az Parvardigorat pinhon nest va [hatto] kucaktar jo ʙuzurgtar az on [niz] cize nest, magar inki ʙar kitoʙi ravsan [saʙt suda] ast
